definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Still, the question of where to draw the dress code line is a complicated one.
sentences.chinese: 將學生衣著的長度定在多少仍然是一個很複雜的問題。

sentences.english: Our boyfriend's clothes make us look elfin &gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 在男朋友們的衣著襯托下，顯得靈氣而豪華。

sentences.english: The hostess had exquisite taste in clothes.
sentences.chinese: 女主人在衣著上有個細膩的品味。

sentences.english: I'm really very interested in formal dress .
sentences.chinese: 我對於正式衣著真是很感興趣。

sentences.english: I am not confident of my own good taste in clothing.
sentences.chinese: 我對自己的衣著品味沒有信心。

sentences.english: She has a unique taste in clothes.
sentences.chinese: 她對衣著有一套獨特的品味。

sentences.english: Your clothes are a reflection of your personality.
sentences.chinese: 一個人的衣著可反映出其個性。

sentences.english: The chief material of their garments is silk.
sentences.chinese: 他們衣著主要的材質是絲。

sentences.english: The old man appeared to be a tramp, because he was poorly dressed .
sentences.chinese: 那位老人好像是個流浪者，因爲他的衣著襤褸。

sentences.english: She hides handsome and richly drest aft the blinds of the window.
sentences.chinese: 她美貌，衣著華麗，躲在窗簾背後。

sentences.english: The second thing men look for is clothing.
sentences.chinese: 他們考慮的第二件事是衣著。

sentences.english: Charming in personality and elegant in dress.
sentences.chinese: 氣質浪漫迷人，講究衣著打扮。

sentences.english: An expensively dressed little man turned a corner and approached her.
sentences.chinese: 一個衣著昂貴的小工商業者轉過拐角去接近她。

sentences.english: Our boyfriend's clothes make us look elfin & gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 在男朋友們的衣著襯托下，顯得靈氣而豪華。

definition: long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
